template <typename Block>
struct vsip::impl::Lvalue_factory_type
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_traits.hpp

Traits class to determine whether a block provides an lvalue accessor. The ::type member of this class, when instantiated for a block type, will be one of the above factory classes. By default, we assume there is no direct access to lvalues, so we go through a proxy class that calls get() and put() [see lvalue-proxy.hpp]. The Rebind nested class is for use in specializations that want to say "make the same choice that that block makes"; see subblock.hpp for examples.

Specializations:
Lvalue_factory_type<Subset_block<Block>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Transposed_block<Block>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Permuted_block<Block,Ordering>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Sliced_block<Block,D>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Sliced2_block<Block,D1,D2>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Diag_block<BlockT>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Dense<Dim,T,OrderT,Local_map>>
Lvalue_factory_type<Us_block<Dim,T,LayoutT,Local_map>>
